resources.string: The date with red text is the current date
This icon means it is the day you have a period
This icon means it is not a ovulation day
This icon means it is a ovulation day
Select your first day of you previous period
The system will estimate the ovulation days
Scroll the calendar to seek for the ovulation/non-ovulation days
Click this icon to show this usage
Select a day with period icon
Then click "Not Menstrual Day" button, it will no longer mark the day as a "Menstrual Day"
